help.description: **Use `{{cmd}}` to see more details of a command!**
help.footer: Remember, [arg] is an optional argument and <arg> is a necessary argument for executing the command!
help.title: Here are some of my commands!

staffrole.usageFormats:
`{{prefix}}{{command}} add <@mention/id> <role>` - add a role to the user.
`{{prefix}}{{command}} remove <@mention/id> <role>` - removes a role from the user.
`{{prefix}}{{command}} check <@mention/id>` - check user roles.
staffrole.roleHigher: <{warning}> {{member}}, You **can't add or remove** this role.
